CustomField.formula: IF((clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Company' || clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Trust' || clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'Family Trust' || clcommon__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name == 'SMSF') && (Party_Type_Name__c != 'Solicitor' || Party_Type_Name__c != 'Broker' || Party_Type_Name__c != 'Aggregator' || Party_Type_Name__c != 'Broker Underwriter' || Party_Type_Name__c != 'Valuer' || Party_Type_Name__c != 'Sales Channel'),'Business Party', 'Not Business Party')
CustomField.label: Business Applicant?
